questions.question: What is a Nightliner?
questions.answer: A Nightliner is a specially equipped tour bus with sleeping accommodations, mainly used by bands, artists and their crews on tours. Our Nightliners offer 12 or 16 comfortable sleeping berths, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and entertainment systems.

questions.question: How many people can sleep in a Nightliner?
questions.answer: Our 12 Sleeper Nightliner accommodates 12 people, while our 16 Sleeper Nightliner has 16 sleeping places (12 in a main area and 4 in a separate area).

questions.question: Can you cook in the Nightliner?
questions.answer: Yes, both Nightliners have a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, coffee machine, microwave, toaster and kettle, so you can prepare meals on the road.

questions.question: Is there a toilet and shower in the Nightliner?
questions.answer: Yes, our Nightliners offer a full bathroom with shower and toilet (no chemical toilet) as well as a separate shower room for maximum comfort.
